articles.title: On way back from Brics Summit in South Africa, Modi skeds a quick visit to Greece - Hindustan Times
articles.description: There is no official word from the Indian side whether the Chinese president will be among the leaders with whom PM Modi will hold talks on the sidelines of Brics Summit in South Africa | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will make two foreign trips ahead of the G20 Summit that will take him to South Africa, Greece and Indonesia to participate in two regional summits and to revi… [+4416 chars]

articles.title: Cape Verde: Authorities 'left people to die' despite warnings about migrant boat weeks before tragedy, rights group alleges - CNN
articles.description: Four national authorities and the European Union’s border patrol agency Frontex failed to make “sufficient” efforts to prevent the deaths of dozens of migrants off West Africa, despite being warned about the boat weeks before, a Spanish human rights NGO alleg…
